text: Mars Hill Crossroads is an unincorporated community in Forsyth County, in the U.S. state of Georgia. ==History== Mars Hill Crossroads was named after a local church, which in turn was named after Mars Hill (Areopagus) in Classical Athens. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Forsyth County, Georgia
title: Mars Hill Crossroads, Forsyth County, Georgia
